Tables.DrillDownFields: Title, Organization, Year, Month, Day, Abstract,FinalCode

LegServiceAgencyReports.Title: Faculty Output and Salary Costs of State-Related and State-Owned Colleges and Universities
LegServiceAgencyReports.Abstract: This 10th annual report summarizes the instructional outputs, instructional faculty salary costs, tuitions and Commonwealth instructional appropriations for Pennsylvania's State-related and State-owned universities--the Commonwealth's public universities during 1981-1982.

LegServiceAgencyReports.Title: Probate, Estate and Fiduciaries Code: Proposed Amendments and Comments--1983
LegServiceAgencyReports.Abstract: This report summarizes amendments to the Probate, Estates, and Fiduciaries Code.

LegServiceAgencyReports.Title: Proposed Commonwealth Procurement Code
LegServiceAgencyReports.Abstract: Pursuant to House Resolution 93 of 1981, this report studies possible changes to PA's agency procurement code. Suggestions include: creating a Procurement Policy Office, consolidate procurement laws into Title 62 of the PA Consolidated Statutes, and centralize certain procurements into the General Services agency.

LegServiceAgencyReports.Title: Separating Transportation from Fixed Utility Regulations under the Public Utility Commission
LegServiceAgencyReports.Abstract: Pursuant to Senate Resolution 35 of 1983, this study was commissioned to examine the impact of separating the Public Utilities Commission into two separate entities: one to regulate transportation services, and the other to regulate electric, gas, water, and telephone companies.

LegServiceAgencyReports.Title: Bankruptcy Exemptions: A proposed Revision
LegServiceAgencyReports.Abstract: Pursuant to House Resolution 243 of 1980, this report examines the modernization of state bankruptcy statutes in accordance to federal standards.

LegServiceAgencyReports.Title: Faculty Output and Salary Costs of State-Related and State-Owned Colleges and Universities
LegServiceAgencyReports.Abstract: This 9th annual report summarizes the instructional outputs, instructional faculty salary costs, tuitions and Commonwealth instructional appropriations for Pennsylvania's State-related and State-owned universities--the Commonwealth's public universities during 1980-1981.

LegServiceAgencyReports.Title: Proposed Codification of Laws Relating to Aviation into the Pennsylvania Consolidation Statutes, Title 74, Part IV
LegServiceAgencyReports.Abstract: Pursuant to House Concurrent Resolution 194 of 1982, this report details proposed reforms to modernize aviation standards and regulations in PA.

LegServiceAgencyReports.Title: 1981-82 Report: Special Joint Committee of the General Assembly to Review Retirement Cost- of-Living Supplements and Funding Sources
LegServiceAgencyReports.Abstract: Pursuant to Act 130 of 1979, this report is a review of recent retirement cost-of-Living supplements and funding sources in PA as part of the state and school retirement systems.

LegServiceAgencyReports.Title: Faculty Output and Salary Costs of State-Related and State-Owned Colleges and Universities
LegServiceAgencyReports.Abstract: This report summarizes the instructional outputs, instructional faculty salary costs, tuitions and Commonwealth instructional appropriations for Pennsylvania's State-related and State-owned universities--the Commonwealth's public universities during 1979-1980.

LegServiceAgencyReports.Title: Probate, Estates and Fiduciaries Code: Proposed Amendments and Comments, 1981 and Proposed Revision of Inheritance Tax Laws and Codification of Chapter 17, Title 72, of the Pennsylvania Consolidated Statutes
LegServiceAgencyReports.Abstract: This report summarizes proposed changes to the Probate, Estates and Fiduciaries Code, proposed revision of inheritance tax laws, and codification of Chapter 17, Title 72, of the Pennsylvania Consolidated Statutes.

LegServiceAgencyReports.Title: Faculty Output and Salary Costs of State-Related and State-Owned Colleges and Universities
LegServiceAgencyReports.Abstract: This report summarizes the instructional outputs, instructional faculty salary costs, tuitions and Commonwealth instructional appropriations for Pennsylvania's State-related and State-owned universities--the Commonwealth's public universities during 1978-1979.

LegServiceAgencyReports.Title: Local School Tax Reform: A Proposal to Reduce Property and Nuisance Taxes
LegServiceAgencyReports.Comments: Could not access report because link is dead (3/12/10)

LegServiceAgencyReports.Title: Private Detectives and Security Business
LegServiceAgencyReports.Abstract: Pursuant to Senate Concurrent Resolution 222 of 1978, this report examines proposals to regulate the private detective business in PA.

LegServiceAgencyReports.Title: Proposed Revision of Adoption Law and Codification into Pennsylvania Consolidated Statutes, Title 23, Part III
LegServiceAgencyReports.Abstract: This report examines changes of PA's adoption laws as proposed by House Bill 213 of 1979.

LegServiceAgencyReports.Title: The Impact of PIDA Loans on Employment
LegServiceAgencyReports.Abstract: Pursuant to House Resolution 86 of 1979, this report studies the success of the Pennsylvania Industrial Development Authority's loan program in increasing employment.

LegServiceAgencyReports.Title: Administration of Pennsylvania's Child Abuse Law
LegServiceAgencyReports.Abstract: Pursuant to Act 124 of 1975, this report examines whether state agencies are meeting mandates set for carrying out the Child Protective Services Law.

LegServiceAgencyReports.Title: Faculty Output and Salary Costs of State-Related and State-Owned Colleges and Universities
LegServiceAgencyReports.Abstract: This report summarizes the instructional outputs, instructional faculty salary costs, tuitions and Commonwealth instructional appropriations for Pennsylvania's State-related and State-owned universities--the Commonwealth's public universities during 1977-1978.

LegServiceAgencyReports.Title: Interim Report of the Select Task Force to Study Cost-of-Living Adjustments and Benefit Funding for the State and School Retirement Systems
LegServiceAgencyReports.Abstract: Pursuant to Senate Resolution No. 6 of 1979, this report includes amendments and recommended changes to Titles 24 and 71 of the Pennsylvania Consolidated Statutes in regards to a cost of living adjustment for state and public school employees.

LegServiceAgencyReports.Title: Probate, Estates and Fiduciaries Code: Proposed Amendments and Comments, 1979: Including a Study of the Impact of Inheritance Taxes on Decedents' Domicile
LegServiceAgencyReports.Abstract: This report examines proposed changes to the Probate, Estates and Fiduciaries Code, this Includes a study of the impact of inheritance taxes on decedents' estates, amongst other things.
